plot: What do people do, when the law prevents them from protecting themselves? Documentary film on the small Irish village that stood up to Big Oil.
title: The Pipe
plot_es: What do people do, when the law prevents them from protecting themselves? Documentary film on the small Irish village that stood up to Big Oil.
plot_en: What do people do, when the law prevents them from protecting themselves? Documentary film on the small Irish village that stood up to Big Oil.
